description:
Overview of metrics from Prometheus 2.0.  
Useful for using prometheus to monitor your prometheus.
Revisions welcome!

panels.description: Prometheus实例的CPU使用率
panels.title: CPU Utilization of Pod

panels.description: Prometheus实例的内存使用率
panels.title: Memory Utilization of Pod

panels.description: 各个实例过去5分钟的平均网络发送速率
panels.title: Network Transmit Rate of Pod

panels.description: 各个实例过去5分钟的平均网络接收速率
panels.title: Network Received Rate of Pod

panels.description: 各个实例过去5分钟的平均读取磁盘的速率
panels.title: Filesystem Read Rate of Pod

panels.description: 各个实例过去5分钟的平均写磁盘的速率
panels.title: Filesystem Write Rate of Pod

panels.description: 过去5分钟内Prometheus示例的请求平均延迟的0.9分位，按照handler进行分组
panels.title: HTTP Requests Average Latency Group by Handler

panels.description: Prometheus当前抓取metrics的平均延迟，按照Job和Service进行分组
panels.title: Prometheus Scrape Latency Group by Job and Service

panels.description: Prometheus引擎过去5分钟内在处理查询时的平均延时，会按照处理的阶段进行分组
panels.title: Prometheus Engine Query Latency Group by Slice

panels.description: Prometheus在过去5分钟评估规则的平均延迟
panels.title: Rule Evaluation Average Latency

panels.description: 当前Prometheus过去5分钟内同步target的平均延迟，按照Job进行分组
panels.title: Target Sync Latency Group by Job

panels.description: 当前Prometheus发现的目标数和当前正在抓取的目标数
panels.title: Targets Discovered and Active

panels.description: 当前Prometheus采集的target是否UP，按照Service进行分组。如果正常可以采集对应的值是1，如果Service的全部实例都不能采集对应的值是0。
panels.title: Targets UP Group by Service

panels.description: 当前Prometheus内存储的时序序列总和
panels.title: Series Count

panels.description: Prometheus在过去5分钟内，创建/删除的时序序列数
panels.title: Series Created and Removed

panels.description: Prometheus实例在过去5分钟添加时序序列采样点的总数
panels.title: Samples Append Rate

panels.description: 当前Prometheus的Head Chunks的数量
panels.title: Head Chunks Count

panels.description: Prometheus过去5分钟内拒绝的Scrape总数
panels.title: Rejected Scrapes Count

panels.description: 当前Prometheus过去5分钟内发生的失败和错误次数
panels.title: Prometheus Failures and Errors

panels.description: 当前Prometheus过去5分钟内发送的通知消息总数
panels.title: Send Notifications Count

panels.description: 当前Prometheus从目标抓取metrics的间隔分布情况
panels.title: Scrape Interval Group by Interval and Quantile

panels.description: 当前Prometheus过去5分钟内抓取目标的次数，按照时间间隔进行分组
panels.title: Target Scrape Count Group by Interval

panels.description: Prometheus实例的goroutines数量
panels.title: Goroutines Group by Instance

panels.description: 过去5分钟内Prometheus花在GC上的时间，按照实例进行分组
panels.title: GC Durations Group by Instance

title: Prometheus
